curam.util.orgtree.impl

Class OrgTreeJsonItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • curam.util.orgtree.impl.OrgTreeJsonItem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OrgTreeItem

    public class OrgTreeJsonItem
extends java.lang.Object
implements OrgTreeItem
    The basic implementation of the lazy loaded tree item. Outputs item data in the JSON format as required by the Dojo JsonRestStore.

    • Constructor Summary

      • addParam

        public void addParam(java.lang.String paramName,
                     java.lang.String paramValue)
        Adds the named parameter to the tree item and sets its value. The parameter=value pair gets appended to the URL query string from the node corresponding to this tree item.
        Specified by:
        addParam in interface OrgTreeItem
        Parameters:
        paramName - the name of the parameter to be added to the item.
        paramValue - the value of the named parameter.

      • setLazyLoad

        public void setLazyLoad(java.lang.String loaderClass)
        Marks the current item as being lazy loaded, which means that its children information is obtained later, by a separate request.
        Specified by:
        setLazyLoad in interface OrgTreeItem
        Parameters:
        loaderClass - the name of the loader class used to construct the children information for the current item.

      • setSelected

        public void setSelected()
        Marks the current item in the tree as being selected. Once loaded, this item should be highlighted in the tree and the appropriate page loaded. Note that if selected information is set subsequently by any child items or siblings being added, the last occurrence will be used as the finally selected.
        Specified by:
        setSelected in interface OrgTreeItem

      • setSelected

        public void setSelected(java.lang.String selectedNode)
        Marks the specified item in the tree as being selected. Once loaded, this item should be highlighted in the tree and the appropriate page loaded. The selectedNode should specify the full path to the selected node in the tree in the format '/ancestorId1/../ancestorId#n/parentId/selectedNodeId'. If the method is used with null or blank string argument, the current item will be set as selected, the equivalent of using setSelected. Note that if selected information is set subsequently by any child items or siblings being added, the last occurrence will be used as the finally selected.
        Specified by:
        setSelected in interface OrgTreeItem
        Parameters:
        selectedNode - the path to the selected node.

      • addChild

        public void addChild(OrgTreeItem childItem)
        Adds another item as a child item to the current one.
        Specified by:
        addChild in interface OrgTreeItem
        Parameters:
        childItem - the tree item to be added as a child of the current item.

      • getOutput

        public java.lang.Object getOutput()
        Returns the JSON format representation of this tree item.
        Specified by:
        getOutput in interface OrgTreeItem
        Returns:
        Object JSON object representing the fully rendered lazy loaded tree item.
